about_the_game:
"Touhou Fantasy " is a barrage shooting game。

"Touhou Fantasy " centers around bullet hell combat, taking players into a fantastical adventure story featuring Cirno.

At the beginning of the game, Cirno inadvertently triggers a mysterious teleportation device during an ice game, transporting her to a magical and unknown world. In this new world, Cirno must rely on her bullet hell skills to battle various enemies. The bullet hell combat system in the game is meticulously designed, combining strategy and reflexes, requiring players to find ways to survive through dense bullet patterns. Each battle is filled with challenges, especially against powerful boss enemies, where players need to utilize Cirno's ice abilities and unlocked new skills. During combat, players can also collect energy to unleash powerful special moves that can change the course of battle. The game offers more than just combat, with a variety of levels and environments for players to explore.

Exploration and Unlocking:

Players will explore a vibrant game world, unlocking side quests and hidden secrets. Each quest adds depth and background to the game world.

Character Interaction and Story Development:

The game emphasizes character development and interaction. During the adventure, players will encounter characters from different regions. These characters become companions and propel the story through dialogue and interaction. Players can influence relationships and experience different story paths and endings through their choices.

Visual and Auditory Performance:

The game features outstanding visual and auditory performance, with each frame resembling a vivid painting, and the music adding emotional depth with its dynamic and melodious tunes.

Whether a die-hard fan of the Touhou Project or new to the series, players can find their own enjoyment and emotion in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
